content: The latest research on Ketogenic diets is also very promising. First you are on a ketogenig(very low carb) diet which starves the cancer of fuel. Combine that with Hyperbaric oxygen therapy which increases oxygen levels, and supplement that with exogenous ketones. Add something like Bicarb to alkalize the body and you have an excellent cancer treatment. One can then add things like hyperthermia etc. The truth is that oncologists literally murder their patients for money.
